channel.title: Morning Mail
channel.description: Stay updated on the latest news and events happening in the RPI community.

item.title: Fall 2025 Student Course Evaluations Now Open
item.description: Date: Tuesday, November 25, 2025 (all day) - Fall 2025 course evaluations are now open. The evaluation period will be open from November 25th through December 11th. Your feedback is very important to the Institute, the five schools, and their departments, so please complete evaluation surveys for all your courses! Evaluations will be available through Thursday, December 11th, 2025.
item.author: Students

item.title: Introduction to Nationally Competitive Fellowships: Funding Your Graduate Education | Dec. 3 (Registration Required by Dec. 2)
item.description: Date: Wednesday, December 3, 2025 10:00 AM - 11:00 AM - Competitive programs provide salary and tuition for graduate students, allowing you to focus on your research, network within and beyond your field, and travel for research and conferences. Learn how to find and apply to programs. Graduate students, juniors and seniors are invited to this virtual information session highlighting major programs Rensselaer students are eligible for. Register at https://surveys.rpi.edu/jfe/form/SV…
item.author: Students

item.title: Thanksgiving Dinner | Nov. 27 (Registration Required)
item.description: Date: Thursday, November 27, 2025 11:30 AM - 2:00 PM - Join us for an unforgettable Thanksgiving Dinner hosted by RecWell at the Mueller Center. This festive gathering promises a feast of turkey and treats, surrounded by the warmth of the RPI community. This event is FREE to all students, faculty and staff. Guests are welcome to accompany anyone with an RPI ID. Please use the link to register.
item.author: Community

item.title: RPI Shuttle Service Announcement
item.description:
Please be advised that there will be no RPI shuttle services from November 24, 2025 through November 29, 2025 in observance of the Thanksgiving break. Regular shuttle operations will resume on November 30, 2025.

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
item.author: Community
